name: AF Missile Multi-Launcher, Disposable, Crewed (DaFmLC-15)
description: A crewed disposable anti-flyer missile multi-launcher. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
